titles.title: Electing a Member to certain standing committees of the House of Representatives.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to without objection.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

term.name: House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform
House Committee on Science, Space, and Technology

bill.summary: 4/16/2013--Passed House without amendment. Elects a specified named Member to the following House Committees: (1) Oversight and Government Reform; and (2) Science, Space, and Technology.
